layer.name: Skill
layer.definition: Get measurably better at what matters.

questions.text: I have developed effective systems for managing commitments — I rarely drop things because I have reliable methods.
I know how to break large goals into actionable steps — I have skill in planning, not just dreaming.
I can make decisions efficiently — I have developed frameworks that prevent paralysis without being reckless.
I know my own patterns of resistance and avoidance — I've studied myself and know how to work with (or around) my weaknesses.
I can estimate how long things will take with reasonable accuracy — my planning skill has been calibrated by experience.
